mapper.update: update userinfo set compname = #{compname}, compdetail = #{compdetail}, compaddress1 = #{compaddress1}, compaddress2 = #{compaddress2}, compphone = #{compphone} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into gamedetail (num, title, content, writer, category, price, dcrate, gamefilepath) values((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from gamedetail), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{category}, #{price}, #{dcrate}, #{gamefilepath})
